verses.verse: And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and for their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, and for their <S%H8199>judges<s%>, and for their <S%H7860>officers<s%>; and they <S%H3320>presented<s%> themselves <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> of old <S%H5769>time<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River<s%>, even <S%H8646>Terah<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>: and they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>.

And I <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> from <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River<s%>, and <S%H3212>led<s%> him throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>.

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H6215>Esau<s%>: and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3290>it<s%>: and Jacob and his <S%H1121>children<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and I <S%H5062>plagued<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, according to that <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> <S%H310>thereof<s%>: and afterward I brought you <S%H3318>out<s%>.

And I <S%H3318>brought<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and ye <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> with <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and with <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> unto the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>.

And when they <S%H6817>cried<s%> out unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3990>darkness<s%> between you and the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> upon <S%H3680>them<s%>, and covered <S%H5869>them<s%>; and your eyes <S%H7200>saw<s%> what I <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and ye <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And I <S%H935>brought<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H5414>you<s%>; and I gave them into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and ye <S%H3423>possessed<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>; and I <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from before <S%H6440>you<s%>.

Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> to curse <S%H7043>you<s%>;
but I <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>; therefore he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you <S%H1288>still<s%>: so I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And ye went <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>: and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H567>you<s%>, the Amorite, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H1622>Girgashite<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>; and I <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1644>you<s%>, which drove them out from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8147>you<s%>, even the two <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>; not with thy <S%H2719>sword<s%>, nor with thy <S%H7198>bow<s%>.

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you a <S%H776>land<s%> whereon thou hadst not <S%H3021>labored<s%>, and <S%H5892>cities<s%> which ye <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3427>not<s%>, and ye dwell <S%H3754>therein<s%>; of vineyards and <S%H2132>oliveyards<s%> which ye <S%H5193>planted<s%> not do ye <S%H398>eat<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him in <S%H8549>sincerity<s%> and in <S%H571>truth<s%>; and put <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River<s%>, and in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and <S%H5647>serve<s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And if it seem <S%H7489>evil<s%> unto <S%H4310>you<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H977>choose<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5869>whom<s%> ye will <S%H5647>serve<s%>; whether the <S%H430>gods<s%> which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> that were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River<s%>, or the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, in whose <S%H776>land<s%> ye <S%H3427>dwell<s%>: but as for me and my <S%H1004>house<s%>, we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2486>Far<s%> be it from us that we should <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>;

for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, he it is that brought us and our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>, and that <S%H6213>did<s%> those <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> in our <S%H5869>sight<s%>, and <S%H8104>preserved<s%> us in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein we <S%H1980>went<s%>, and among all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the midst of whom we <S%H5674>passed<s%>;

and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> drove <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> us all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, even the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>: therefore we also will <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for he is our <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, Ye <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for he is a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>; he is a <S%H7072>jealous<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>; he will not <S%H5375>forgive<s%> your <S%H6588>transgression<s%> nor your <S%H2403>sins<s%>.

If ye <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, then he will <S%H7725>turn<s%> and do you <S%H7489>evil<s%>, and <S%H3615>consume<s%> <S%H310>you<s%>, after that he hath done you <S%H3190>good<s%>.
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H5647>Nay<s%>; but we will serve <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, Ye are <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> against yourselves that ye have <S%H977>chosen<s%> you <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>. And they said, We are <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>.

Now therefore put <S%H5493>away<s%>, said <S%H5236>he<s%>, the foreign <S%H430>gods<s%> which are <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H5186>you<s%>, and incline your <S%H3824>heart<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> will we <S%H5647>serve<s%>, and unto his <S%H6963>voice<s%> will we <S%H8085>hearken<s%>.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> them a <S%H2706>statute<s%> and an <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; and he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, and set it <S%H6965>up<s%> there under the <S%H427>oak<s%> that was by the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H68>Behold<s%>, this stone shall be a <S%H5713>witness<s%> against <S%H8085>us<s%>; for it hath heard all the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H5713>us<s%>: it shall be therefore a witness against <S%H3584>you<s%>, lest ye deny your <S%H430>God<s%>.
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> sent the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H4191>died<s%>, being a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>.

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in <S%H8556>Timnathserah<s%>, which is in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> that <S%H3117>outlived<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and had <S%H3045>known<s%> all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that he had <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H6912>buried<s%> they in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, in the <S%H2513>parcel<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> which <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> for a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H7192>money<s%>: and they became the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>.

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>; and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, which was <S%H5414>given<s%> him in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.
